0: We take a disciplined approach to our financial capital allocation strategy, which continues to focus on building stakeholder value and is driven by our
priority to invest in the business and capacity and our capital needs. We also seek to pay competitive dividends, optimize our portfolio, look for innovative
ways to unlock value across our assets, and, from time-to-time, engage in mergers and acquisitions. As we invest in our IDM 2.0 strategy and implement
our next phase of capacity expansions and the acceleration of our process technology roadmap, our allocation priorities have shifted more heavily toward
investing in the business and away from stock repurchases. In the long term, we will continue to look for opportunities to further our strategy through
acquisitions while remaining disciplined on capital allocation.
